description: Stylesheet defining CSS variables and styles for a theme management system, including responsive design for a simple note-keeping application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class that styles the primary container of the note-keeping app.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header class for the main application area, displaying the app title and logo.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the app with a color transition effect.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button class for toggling themes, with hover and active styles.
